jd: From: Ravinder, CygnusPro Software Solutions ravinder@cygnuspro.com Reply to: ravinder@cygnuspro.com Job Title: : Program Manager-Retail WMSLocation : Dublin, CA(Hybrid)Duration: Long Term Job Description: ResponsibilitiesProvide an oversight to WMS modernization programProvide recommendations for the governance of this programProvide the industry best practices for successful implementation of the Planning and Architecture Design Phase – 1 Partner with Ross Project Leads to execute this programParticipate in coordination between Business and technical project teams.Ensure the creation and review of all relevant documentation and Deliverables.Facilitate timely governance meetings and project updates.Monitor and evaluate project progress and status reporting.Manage escalations and issues that may arise.Responsible for weekly status, Program Advisory and Steering Committee presentations.
